oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: The Eddy Arnold Show - #063
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The Eddy Arnold Show #63, produced and transcribed in Nashville, TN. by Brown Radio Productions. Featuring Eddy Arnold and the Tennessee Plowboys, the Willis Brothers (introduced as the Oklahoma Wranglers), Roy Wiggins, and host 'Pappy' Hal Horton. Opening theme music, 'Cattle Call'; closing theme music, 'Boil Them Cabbage Down'.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Eddy Arnold; Tennessee Plowboys; Willis Brothers; Oklahoma Wranglers
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening statement (Hal Horton) -- Opening theme -- Opening statement (Eddy Arnold) -- Be Sure There's No Mistake (Eddy Arnold) -- Eddy Arnold talks -- Foggy River (Eddy Arnold) -- Hal Horton introduces the Oklahoma Wranglers -- Roll Along Jordan (Oklahoma Wranglers) -- Eddy Arnold talks -- [Unidentified fiddle tune] (Skeeter Willis fiddle) -- Eddy Arnold talks -- Ages And Ages Ago (Eddy Arnold) -- Closing statement (Eddy Arnold, Hal Horton) -- Closing theme
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Eddy Arnold Show (Radio program); Horton, Hal, -1948; Arnold, Eddy, 1918-2008; Tennessee Plowboys; Wiggins, Roy; Willis Brothers; Willis, Skeeter, -1976; Willis, Vic, -1995
